date.headline: Battle of Plassey
date.text:
The defeat of the last independent ruler brings Bengal under the control of the East India Company.

Wikipedia (Battle of Plassey)

date.headline: Regulating Act of 1773
date.text:
Due to debt and mismanagement of the East India Company, Britain consolidates and reforms Company rule in India.

John F. Riddick, The History of British India: A Chronology (Greenwood Publishing Group, 2006), 21.

Wikipedia (Regulating Act of 1773)

asset.caption: The Regulating Act as printed in a contemporary edition of Statutes at Large

date.headline: Government of India Act 1858
date.text:
Control of the Government of India is transferred from the East India Company to the British Crown.

Wikipedia (Government of India Act 1858)

date.headline: The Mountbatten Plan
date.text:
The partition of India begins the transfer of power to new sovreign states once held by the British Raj.

Wikipedia (Partition of India)
